article_title: Campaigns ramp up state Senate push with TV spots in key races
article_text:

og.description: Less than two months before a crucial November election to determine control the Virginia Senate, Democrats and Republicans have started to put their money into media backing their best bets for stealing a seat — and their biggest fears of losing one.
og.title: Campaigns ramp up state Senate push with TV spots in key races
